Please ADD airplane sighting.

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AirplaneSighting } from '../../../models/airplane-sighting'; import { SightingServiceService } from '../../../services/sighting-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-gallery', templateUrl: './gallery.component.html', styleUrls: ['./gallery.component.css'] }) export class GalleryComponent implements OnInit { public sightings: AirplaneSighting[] = []; constructor(private sightingService: SightingServiceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadSightings(); } private loadSightings() { this.sightingService.getList().subscribe( result => { this.sightings = result; }, error => { console.error(error); }); } deleteSighting(event: Event): void { let id = Number.parseInt((event.target as Element).id); this.sightingService.delete(id).subscribe( result => { this.loadSightings(); }, error => { console.error(error) }); } }
